title: What arguments are there against the current brand of liberal progressivism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually the ones I hear are quite insane. Often having to do with wanting to murder babies, as if we run around with machetes. "Gay marriage infringes on my marriage". "We should end welfare. If they can't afford kids they shouldn't have them" (but we don't want to give them sex ed in school or access to free contraception)

One argument is that progressivism’s goal is to actually increase poverty in order to gain political advantage. Lyndon B Johnson said about his “great society” program, that so decimated the African American family ““I’ll have those niggers voting Democrat for two-hundred years.”
